articles.description: US Open triumph showed the supremely talented 21-year-old playing with a newfound grit – and she may yet get even better
articles.content: In the final week of last season, Iga Swiateks reward for a solid year was a place among the very best at the WTA Finals in Guadalajara. After the highs of winning the French Open late in 2020 and th… [+4889 chars]
